post.text: My acceptance speech was 75 minutes 'long!' Watch how long it really was - - - by watching the 28 second video below. THANK YOU #TrumpTrain - I love you! Lets MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN! -DJT

comment.author: Sarah
comment.text: Hillary Clinton has nothing of substance to say and I will guarantee that her speech will be under 45 minutes. There is so much to talk about during these troubling times and if you spoke for 3 hours, I would have watched every minute! #TrumpForTruth #HillaryForDeception

replies.author: Jackson
replies.text: Nobody wants to hear her speak anyways.....lol
